name: Wallnut chasing mouse chasing cat chasing dog chasing man
name_original: Wallnut chasing mouse chasing cat chasing dog chasing man
description:
A game where you push crates while being chased by a dog that is chased by a cat that is chased by a mouse that is chased by a walking wallnut.

Did you ever felt THAT bored ?
